scripts.clean-all: for p in core client backend-utils engine sdk; do npm --prefix papiea-$p run clean || exit 1; done
scripts.build-all: for p in core client backend-utils engine sdk; do npm --prefix papiea-$p run build || exit 1; done
scripts.patch-all: for p in core client backend-utils engine sdk; do npm --prefix papiea-$p version patch || exit 1; done
scripts.install-all: for p in core client backend-utils engine sdk; do npm --prefix papiea-$p install || exit 1; done
scripts.build-all!: npm run clean-all && npm run build-all
